#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
        srand(time(NULL));
        int n = rand()%1000 + 1;
        printf("%d\n", n);
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
                int x = rand()%10000 + 1;
                printf("%d%c", x, i == n-1 ? '\n' : ' ');
        }
        return 0;
}
